<<<<<<< HEAD
The sinners conuersion. By Henrie Smith Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.
[32] p.
Printed [by Peter Short] for William Leake, and are to be solde at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Crane, At London : 1594.
Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-B. The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A.i."; the last leaf is blank. Another edition has "william Leake" in imprint. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

Printed [by Peter Short] for William Leake, and are to be solde at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Crane, At London : 1594.
Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-B. The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A.i."; the last leaf is blank. Another edition has "william Leake" in imprint. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Crane
